scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run build:html && npm run build:css
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:css
scripts.build:html: npm run clean:html && cp index.html build/
scripts.watch:html: npm run build:html && chokidar index.html -c 'npm run build:html'
scripts.build:css: npm run clean:css && lessc --source-map css/style.less build/$npm_package_name.css
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css && chokidar 'css/**/*.less' -c 'npm run build:css'
scripts.build:about: npm run clean:about && npm run mkdir:about && cp pages/about/index.html build/about/
